Were Hong Kong and Singapore similarly rushed?
No, we had a few days in Singapore. We stayed in a really nice resort called The Sentosa, where everyone enjoyed getting some poolside action and going down to the beach. And I went into Singapore and had a walk around the markets, which was really interesting.

Guy Berryman, Coldplay.com

another snippet..

The Coldplay-shaped puppets were on the trip too. There's been a lot of talk amongst fans about the Guy Berryman puppet. What do you think of it?
Well, I maintain that I got a raw deal, actually.

That has been the general consensus. You're a good-looking chap, with a less-than-attractive puppet.
Haha! But then I do appreciate the fact that they're supposed to be based on the traditional Punch and Judy characters. Hence one of them had to get the more traditional Mr Punch-shaped face. But it's alright, I'm over it now.

Perhaps it was an inverted compliment; the best looking member, gets the ugliest puppet.
Oh right, OK. I hope so!

Sun burnt. Like really extremely cooked.BBQ-ed. Ow my lower arms. Pass me the ketchup!! BUT it was all worth it... CAUSE the photoshoot was totally awesome!!!! though there were some hilarious moments. Like for instant when me n Ella walk on the suspended bridge. Holycow, we didn't know that the gap was THAT wide. Even walking on the side of the steel walkway was scary as hell. It creaks in certain places, the barricades were lose. I mean OMFG. We were literally quaking in the knees. Every concrete slab (there were two) was met with cheers!! The wind was also being an ass as well. although it scares the shit outta we we still went back to take some 'stun' poses. we felt so brave!!! funny thing though we felt comfortable after taking a few pics. anways i got seriously alot of pictures to edit.. so yeah be prepared to see a whole lot. oh yeah this is our very own le_purestatic posing infront of us. and yeah with me behind it......... oh yeah ella goes by the name of Elouis Opalchensik.. *shakes head*

im in a dilemma between preferring  to play poorly but getting the point versus playing extremely well but getting no where?
the truth is taking the whole freaking nature of the game a draw is still better than losing all 3 points. especially against teams
like Stokes - defending resolutely - kudos to them on that. but i'm not blind .. fact remains we should have won comfortably.
but a point is still a point. i rather have a point rather than nothing. the season is longer still.

i prefer not to talk about the other teams. call me a rose tinted whack job but i'm not goin to worry the Mancs, Le Arse , Cheatski and Citeh's of the world. i'm aware of them but i'm not obsessed by them. cos they are not my team. i'm not even gonna touch on the player though i'll still occasionaly spew a few choice words during the game but they play for my team. 

best concentrate on our own team. one game at a time.

ps: i blame myself for utter inconvinience. i should have done a capspam.

Apparently i'm not disenchanted enough to give up capspaming. beware this capspam is somewhat my way of supporting the sharelfc movement without actually contributing. all this are fiction even if it tinge with certain factual stuff.. enjoy....
Where's Georgie? Hicks: Poor lil bastards, they not goin to win this war? No sirree. not gonna happen.. not me nor Georgie will sell. Where the hell is that man? He's late? Meanwhile.. Moores: Ah so Georgie lad, what do yer think about all the fan's buy out deal. Gillette: Well David, to be honest its impressive. But its goin to take a massive revolt to take Hicks down. Moores: Hicks? Don't yer mean the both of yer? Gillette: Err well yeah .. somewhat.. err i gotta go' cheers! * vanished without a trace* A few days later.. Parry: Where the fuck is Gillette? Been tryin to call him and he's not picking up the phone. Sammy: Oh someone not getting any TLC at home. *chuckles* Parry: Son, have you seen George by any chance? Guy: No, i don't know and i don't care. Guy: What's up Parry's arse? He looks like he's about to cry. Fergie: That son is the look of someone about to lose his job. Guy: Naturally. Mc Claren: Oh i know how it feels, mate! It's painful. Guy: Like duh! Fergie: *chortles* At training the next day... Sami: Did yer guys hear the our beloved Georgie has gone MIA? Lucas: Please tell me that's not why Parry mourning over his photo at breakfast. Johnny: Ewwehhh! Can you imagine two sagging bodies going at it! Now that what i call desperate! Carra: Well they can fook emselves all night long for all i care but just not in me head! Rafa: Wait wait wait. you telling me that Parry and Gillette are like.. Stevie: *snorts* Carra lad yer just made Rafa pee in his pants with happiness. Rafa: Well .. it's good new no.. they are gettin what you lot call it hot around the collars. yea? Carra: I'll betcha 5000 pounds that Nando will be willing to do a striptease too? Stevie: I'll double that if yer manage to persuade him to do it! Pepe: I'll triple that amount if all of yer do it!! Rafa: Now boys, it would be more ethical if we give all this bet money to the fans yeah to help them out? Stevie: Well that's true? How about it lads? Dirk: For the good for the club, i'll gladly do it! Stevie: Wait i let me check me socks! I know i keep a stash in here some where. Rafa: No wonder Alex keeps your socks for you! To: The webmaster of LFC.TV

Dear Sir/Mdm,
May i commend you for attempting to make the website more interesting. Even if you
'borrow' my idea without my permission but i forgive you, cos we are all brother/sisters in arms in
this cruel world of football. Although a job with the club would be nice. *hint hint*

But i am rather appalled that you did not manage to grab attention by the horns like
capspams should. It saddens me that such pictures are wasted. Ok maybe my capspams maybe
of an eclectic taste,it could be safe way too.

So here attached to this letter is my CV and an example of how it suppose to be like.
Thank you for reading this. I hope i didnt not offend anyone.

An Adopted Unemployed Scouser,
Aida

PS: didn't know you guys have LJ accounts.
